thread.section_title: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance | calcas.com | 4 of 27
thread.title: Mary Ferreri
thread.title_full: California Casualty Auto and Home Insurance reviewed by Mary Ferreri

author: Mary Ferreri
title: Mary Ferreri
text:
I have always been very pleased with the rates and the outstanding friendly and qualified customer service dept. However, when I totaled my old Nissan last year I was blown away with the way my claim was processed. Thank you for taking care of me during a stressful situation!
Mary Ferreri
